      • getAnswer

        java.lang.String getAnswer(char whichAnswer)
        Returns the requested possible answer
        Parameters:
        whichAnswer - a char denoting which answer A,B,C or D is being requested
        Returns:
        answer string or null if the parameters are outside of the bounds
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Returns:
        boolean value reports whether a question is valid or not
